description: This file contains CSS styles for a tic-tac-toe web game frontend, including theme management, layout, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main class styling for the application, setting layout properties, background colors, and responsive design.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header of the application, including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application, defining color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including hover and active state effects.
